title: zudgezury
author: zudgezury
content: Announcing the launch of the ZudgeZury ERC-20 Coin.https://www.zudgezurycoin.comThe ZudgeZury coin can be used on the Real Time Conflict Resolution Lifestyle Platform ? ZudgeZury app.The ZudgeZury coin is a ERC 20 utility coin that can be exchanged for credits and used on the ZudgeZury app to access digital products and services on the app. The services are largely collaborative decision-making services, while the digital products are emoticons or graphics that can be used to reward users or decorate the user profile. The ZudgeZury coin can also be a reward that users redeem. Ultimately, the ZudgeZury coin allows for the owner to interact with the community for an exhilarating experience. SUMMARY OF THE ZUDGEZURY APPLICATIONZudgeZury is a Real Time Conflict Resolution Lifestyle app built on the fundamental algorithm of Consumer Behavior and Psychology. ZudgeZury aids in decision making by community collaboration and is applicable to both consumer and corporate settings.   ZudgeZury incorporates Real Time Video interactions, asynchronous interactions as well as scalable monetization models.ZZC Smart Contract======0x51A673e060E1ea091B23B53d192058fFE0F2D6b6ZZC Etherscan======https://etherscan.io/address/0x51A673e060E1ea091B23B53d192058fFE0F2D6b6https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/zudgezurySocial Media===https://www.zudgezury.com        https://www.zudgezurycoin.com             https://t.me/zudgezury                 https://t.me/zudgezurycoin         https://twitter.com/Zudgezury    https://twitter.com/Zudgezurycoin              https://Instagram.com/Zudgezuryhttps://www.tiktok.com/@zudgezuryhttps://www.facebook.com/zudgezuryhttps://www.linkedin.com/company/zudgezury/https://discord.gg/TQkDN24cwQhttps://www.reddit.com/r/ZudgeZury/https://disqus.com/by/zudgezurycoin/

comments.author: FreeWorldUsers
comments.body: There are no ERC-20 coins your "coin" is a token do your homework first and learn difference between coins and tokens ...And move it to token section.

comments.author: zudgezury
comments.body: Thank you for your note.   Its known as ZZC for now everywhere.
